array.string: <b:t>5 miles is around the same distance as 8 km. Fill in the gaps.</b:t>
<b:on number="5" suffix=" miles"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="8" suffix=" km"/>
<b:on number="15" suffix=" miles"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="24" suffix=" km"/>
<b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="10" suffix=" miles"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="16" suffix=" km"/>
